name: ArachnoLolo
description:
You drank too much last night, to the point of not remembering what happened. You are in a forest that looks like an old estate in the middle of the night in the middle of nowhere. You have no phones, wallet or car key on you, just a flashlight in your right hand. You should be careful, you don’t feel like to be alone here....

HOW TO PLAY

Z/Q/S/D to walk
E to take page
MOUSE to look
LEFT Click to flash

Hey, I just want to tell you, this game is a "troll". I have made the game with my sister because we wanted to learn and we have learn a lot. 

We hope you will enjoy the game!
